item.title: Security Concepts
item.description: Definition and Terms 1. What is cybersecurity ? Cybersecurity refers to any technologies, practices and policies for preventing cyberattacks or mitigating their impact. The aim is to protect computer systems, applications, devices, data, financial assets and people against cyberthreats. 1 IBM Topics in cybersecurity - https://www.ibm.com/topics/cybersecurityÂ â†©ï¸Ž ðŸ’¡ Cybersecurity is very broad indeed. Hence there are a lot of standard guidelines/frameworks which help companies understand their security posture and take appropriate measures.
